posts.post_content: Run a playset and watch your opponents eyes bleed with rage. Even if they only get milled for two cards (instead of the potential EIGHT) per spell, they have to destroy four cards instead of just one to end the milling. And that's \*\*\*uming these are the only mill cards you have.
